|brand = Khadas |model = VIM1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = S |revision = V11 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2A8Q4-VIM1S |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S905Y4; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.0 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q256JWPQ; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53E512M32D2FW-046 WT:D; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:63:14<!-- C8:63:14:70:00:00/28 --> |oui = B8:13:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.01; |stockos = Linux;5.4.125;OpenWrt 19.07.4
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female (Type-C)
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, via GPIO header,, (921600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1, Bluetooth 5.0, IR receiver, RTC, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, ADC, UART, GPIO |addchip = I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, 8-bit MCU, 8Kb Flash memory, 128b data EEPROM;ST;STM8S003;;1;,,, Fixed 3.3V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B1;;3;,,, Ultra low dropout, 500mA, CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;3;,,, 300mA Low Dropout RF Linear Regulator;SGMicro;SGM2032;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance ESD Protection Array;Amazing Microelectronics;AZ1043;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shenzhen Wesion Tech |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 11, Ubuntu 22.04
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/25/2022 |estreldate = 09/2022 |estprice = 65 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BFVFF3FV |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN AP6256 |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43456; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF2 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Khadas|Amlogic|AMPAK}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905Y4 @2.0GHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A35) *GPU: Mali-G31 MP2 @850MHz :VPU: 4K@60fps AV1, VP9, H.265 Decoding *Storage: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 16GB (eMMC 5.0) :TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM @1176MHz *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM43456 :802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz) 1T1R *USB: 3x USB 2.0 ports *Power: USB (Type-C) port or 4-pin
==Links of Interest== *[https://docs.khadas.com/vim1s Documentation] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/09/09/khadas-vim1s-amlogic-s905y4-sbc/ ''Khadas VIM1S low-profile SBC features Amlogic S905Y4'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/khadas-vim1s-single-board-computer-with-amlogic-s905y4-is-now-available-for-65/ ''Khadas VIM1S single-board computer'' on '''Liliputing''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
